channel.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
channel.description:
Holy shit. It's awesome. I picked it up at noon and literally didn't stop playing for 8 hours, not even to eat. And I've barely scratched the surface. The new combat system is awesome, but unfortunately those chain combos where you stab someone then shoot someone else are basically unstoppable. As if Ezio wasn't already a beast.
The storyline so far is neat, and Rome is gorgeous. I love exploring the aqueducts.
Thoughts?

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: DethklokSoldier
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

What Dethklok said. The series really is about the story, and the multiplayer actually being good is a nice bonus.

When I first heard they were adding multiplayer my heart sank because I was afraid it was just going to be some generic crap, but not only did they come up with something awesome, they actually made it work with the story. I was very, very happy when it turned out to be awesome instead of crap.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: DethklokSoldier
item.description:
Combine:

can’t believe my brother got the game for 360, we don’t even have Live. Hope the SP campaign is worth the full retail price

Assassin’s Creed is all about the SP campaign, you should be worried about the multiplayer, even though it is really awesome.

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I would suggest getting it now if you want to try the multiplayer. It isn’t Call of Duty, Halo, etc. so who knows how long people will actually be playing it?

And I don’t have a preference in the MP character department yet. Though the Courtesan is easy on the eyes.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Winged One:

I like the Doctor, personally. Always had a thing for plague doctors, thought they were awesome since we first learned about them in 10th grade.

I usually play the Prowler, or failing that the Officer. The bit about the Courtesan was just for pun.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Dude, just buy it now. The single player is excellent, and the multiplayer has some serious legs.

Particularly the Courtesan MP model. She slices your throat open. With a FAN.

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: rtanger
item.description:
So…the best way to miss having it…is to never have it in the first place?
o_O
Yes, that makes perfect sense. There’s like some sort of parable for life hidden in that wisdom.

ed- or I could completely miss the spoiler text and sound like a loon.
Never mind me. Carry on.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
GUYS IMPORTANT

If you want to keep your Brutus Dagger and Armor and not lose it forever, don’t get it [!!!SPOILER!!!--------->] [COLOR=‘Black’]while you are holding the Apple.[/<---------------!!!SPOILER!!!] That’s what fucks it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: rtanger
item.description:
I’m not entirely sold on it being longer than ACII, but I will certainly say this about it-- just when you think things are wrapping up, it goes on a little longer. And then, when you think it’s all said and done, it goes on a little longer. Then, just after that, things get really interesting.

Meaty game, for a “2.5” sequel…

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
James.Curse:

WAIIIIIT, the campaing is longer than the one in ACII ???
Ok, now I’m really excited, can’t way for the pc release to be able to play the game.

Indeed. And if you do all the side quests thats even LONGER.
And then there’s multiplayer.
And then there’s the two free DLC packs. (PS3 anyway.)

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood

item.description:
I beat it about a week after launch And you’re right, it’s awesome. Multiplayer is also very well done. A shame I won’t be able to play it when I move in a month.

item.title: Assassins Creed Brotherhood
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
Omega_Absolute:

They weren’t kidding when they said ACB was alot longer than AC2. Finished it today without doing any side quests. Fucking awesome.

WAIIIIIT, the campaing is longer than the one in ACII ???
Ok, now I’m really excited, can’t way for the pc release to be able to play the game.
